text: Youth Festival is a 2004 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jose Thomas, starring Sidharth Bharathan and Bhavana in the lead role. http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/1788/malayalam/youth-festival/index.htm ==Cast== * Aby Kunjumon as Shivan * Sidharth Bharathan as Arjun Achuthan * Bhavana as Parvathy * Sharmilee as Athira Kanakkurup * 'Atlas' Ramachandran as Ramachandran * Harisree Martin as Lonappan * Cochin Haneefa as Kodaiyil Kannakurup * Narayanankutty as Chellappan * Niyas Backer as Shatrukhanan * CI Paul as Kottapuraykal Achuthan * Salim Kumar as Veerapandi * Kishor Satya as Ranjan * Ponnamma Babu * Pala Aravindan * Niyas Backer ==References== ==External links== * Category:2004 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Jose Thomas
title: Youth Festival
